trans-unit.source: Specifies the class a type or member uses to filter the types that are displayed in the class browser dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 指定類別，型別或成員會使用這個類別來篩選類別瀏覽器對話方塊中顯示的型別。

trans-unit.source: The class you use to filter the types to display in the class browser dialog box must implement <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 您用來篩選類別瀏覽器對話方塊中顯示型別的類別必須實作 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute.TypeFilterProviderTypeName%2A> property to determine the name of the filter class.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute.TypeFilterProviderTypeName%2A> 屬性來判斷篩選類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the type that implements <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider" /> to apply to the class or member.
trans-unit.target: 字串，其中包含型別名稱，它會實作 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider" /> 以套用至類別或成員。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute" /> class by using the specified type name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的型別名稱來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that implements <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider" /> to apply to the class or member.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，它會實作 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider" /> 以套用至類別或成員。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeFilterProviderAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the type that implements <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得實作 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider" /> 的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the type that implements <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，其中包含實作 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeFilterProvider" /> 的型別名稱。
